readingMnemonic: What do you <kanji>refuse</kanji>? You refuse to let him stomp all over Little <reading>Kyo</reading>to (きょ). Little Kyoto is your home! And if the giant comes any closer he's going to destroy all the little buildings and shrines and soba noodle shops.
meaningMnemonic: Show your <radical>fingers</radical> to a <radical>giant</radical> to show you <kanji>refuse</kanji> him. Giants are very big. So big that when you talk they can't really hear what you're saying. Hold up all your fingers so that he can see what you mean.
